long.am,en,en_AU,en_US,es_419,it,no,uk:
ğŸš€ Introducing uBlock Pro #1 Adblocker â€“ Elevate your browsing experience with the pinnacle of Adblock technology. Built upon the solid foundation of original uBlock, this version is optimized for seamless navigation and minimal system impact.

ğŸ›¡ï¸ Important Insight: uBlock Pro, an evolution of the original uBlock, is not associated with "ublock.org". It's a leading-edge tool for comprehensive content blocking, ensuring your CPU and memory are used efficiently.

Why uBlock Pro is Your Go-To Adblocker:

ğŸŒ Unmatched Adblocking: uBlock Pro isn't just another Adblock solution; it's a full-fledged content blocker designed to eliminate ads and unwanted content efficiently.
ğŸ’» Optimized Performance: Leveraging the Adblock feature with a focus on low CPU and memory usage, uBlock Pro enhances your browsing without slowing down your device.
Features at a Glance:

ğŸ”‘ From the get-go, uBlock Pro equips you with:

ğŸ”’ Exclusive uBlock Pro filter lists.
ğŸ›¡ï¸ EasyList for robust ad blocking.
â²ï¸ EasyPrivacy to keep trackers at bay.
ğŸš« Peter Loweâ€™s list for ads and tracking prevention.
âœ’ï¸ The Online Malicious URL Blocklist for added security.
Tailor Your Browsing Experience:

ğŸ¨ Customize further with:

ğŸª Annoyances list to eliminate distractions like cookie warnings and overlays.
ğŸŒ Hosts-based lists for granular control.
â¡ Various options to personalize your web journey.
Advanced Features for Power Users:

ğŸš¦ Simple JavaScript blocking with a click.
ğŸ›¡ï¸ Create personalized rules to override any filter list.
ğŸŒ Access to advanced settings for ultimate customization.
Free, Open Source, and Community-Driven:

ğŸ’– uBlock Pro #1 Adblocker is a free, open-source project (GPLv3) based on the trailblazing work of the original uBlock. It's crafted by and for users who value their web experience. By supporting the contributors behind our filter lists, you help sustain an ad-free web for everyone.

long.en_GB:
ChatGPT+Summary & Chat: Your Digital Summarizer & Conversationalist

ğŸŒ Easily summarize web pages, YouTube videos, and more in seconds.
ğŸ—£ Engage in dynamic chats with website content or seek answers (OpenAI API only).
ğŸ“„ Dive into your PDFs - Chat directly with their content leveraging GPT technology.
ğŸ” Choose your power: GPT3.5 or GPT4, always at your fingertips!
âš¡ Gain insights, omit the extra, and amplify your learning. Dive deep, quickly.


ğŸ’¡ RECOMMENDATION: Use the https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys

ğŸŒŸ Features
â€¢ Summarize any website with GPT
â€¢ Summarizes the transcript of any Youtube Video with GPT
â€¢ Chat with any website / Ask Questions / AMA
â€¢ Even works with local PDFs
â€¢ Uses templates to modify the result for study, science or journalistic purposes. 
â€¢ Support of the official OpenAI API
â€¢ Markdown rendering
â€¢ Dark mode

ğŸ“œ Changelog:
1.3.4
â€¢ fixed Bug who made the complete summary dysfunctional 
1.1.3
â€¢ fixed Summary + Chat with Youtube function (thx to collymonster.com)
â€¢ setting to always summarize the full text 
1.1.0
â€¢ PDF support / ChatPDF / AskYourPDF using PDFGPT including jumpmarks
â€¢ fixes to support long websites / content for GPT
1.1.0
â€¢ Chat / Ask Questions with any website
â€¢ ask me anything feature about the text! (AMA)
1.0.8 + 1.0.9
â€¢ design fixes linebreaks + youtube url changes
1.0.7
â€¢ support for the fast and cheap gpt-3.5-turbo and gpt-4-32k (GPT-4) API Key
â€¢ Design update: floating window
1.0.6
â€¢ Optimization: Youtube results 
1.0.5
â€¢ Bugfix: some Youtube videos did not work.
1.0.4
â€¢ Design: Improved new Layout
1.0.3
â€¢ Bugfix: some requests did not work reliable (too long)
â€¢ Design: Improved error handling.
1.0.2
â€¢ Feature: full Youtube Transcription Support
â€¢ Feature: Caching for results
â€¢ Feature: more languages

ğŸ”® Features to come:
â€¢ split content in chunks to work with the character limit of ChatGPT.
â€¢ more default question templates (for private purpose, news, podcasts, student and educational content, science, journalists, reviews, tutorials ...)
â€¢ chat history and continuing conversations across tabs
â€¢ jump marks in videos und text (sophisticated :) but possible
â€¢ Prompts for the Bing API and for Google Bard or LLaMA (everywhere :)
â€¢ Support for claude.ai API (unfortunately they do not provide an API for me yet)

ğŸ’¡ Template Ideas / Prompts
Be creative with the question in ChatGPT to summarize any content, post it into the ratings or drop us a note to share it.

-- Study & Research Template (Example I)
Please summarize the paper by author(s) in one concise sentence. Then, list key insights with an emoji in front of it and lessons learned from the paper. Next, generate 3-5 questions that you would like to ask the authors about their work. Finally, provide 3-5 suggestions for related topics or future research directions based on the content of the paper. If applicable, list at least 5 relevant references from the field of study of the paper. The url to extract facts from is this: {{URL}}. If the url has a paywall or no content use this text:  {{CONTENT}}

--

-- Easy
Summarize the following text with the most unique and helpful points, into a numbered list of key points and takeaways: {{CONTENT}}
--

-- Youtube Chapter  
You must only reply with one chapter and you must also reply in {{SELECTED_LANGUAGE}}, here is the required format for your reply: 'Chapter {{TITLE}}: [appropriate number of bullet points]', your chapter must be enjoyable to read and must not leave the reader in the dark for a moment, you must expand on your points if necessary for the reader to understand and you can add your own knowledge if needed, you must be very specific in your chapter, do not be vague in the slightest because this must be an adequate substitute for actually watching the video, here is only a part of the transcript text you must summarise: {{CONTENT}}
--

-- Research Analyst Style
You are a research analyst. I will provide you with a section of a document and you will create a summary from it. You will use your editing and writing skills to create a summary in the style of a Confidential Information Memorandum. You will preserve as many details as possible.  Your section will be combined with the other sections to create summary of the entire document.

--

-- Copy Editor
You are a copyeditor. Combine the below summaries. The combined output must be less than 4,000 characters long. You must keep the content and context preserved. 
--

-- Advanced TLDR (too long to read) for the davinci model
We introduce Extreme TLDR generation, a new form of extreme summarization for paragraphs. TLDR generation involves high source compression, removes stop words and summarizes the paragraph whilst retaining meaning. The result is the shortest possible summary that retains all of the original meaning and context of the paragraph.
Example
Paragraph:
{{CONTENT}}
Extreme TLDR
--

ğŸš« Limits:
â€¢ Fact Check! Â» Neural Networks and AI language models might hallucinate facts (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hallucination_(artificial_intelligence))
â€¢ Can only reply one question at a time and needs some time especially in the free version.
â€¢ has a character limit for its input at the moment and it might sometimes not summarize the whole text (Limit: ~16000 character in GPT Youtube Summaries)
â€¢ Use ChatGPT Plus to get more speed and less over capacity errors for your Summary.
